DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety sodium tungstate versus placebo patient obesity ( grade I II ) .
DOC.criteria: BMI : 3039.9 Kg/m2 In case male gender , 18 65 year old In case female gender , diagnosis menopause Body weight change < 3 kg last 3 month In case arterial hypertension dyslipemia , change dose last 2 month Exclusion criterion : In case female gender , absence menopause Evidence secondary cause obesity Diabetes , type II Concomitant treatment drug affect body weight Previous surgical intervention obesity
